MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 07-JAN-2021 14:28.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:08am. Our engineers are on their way to the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:30am on Thursday, 07 January 2021
